alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 1:42AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong cold front bring strong winds to portions of far southwestern Mesa, northeastern San Juan and eastern Grand Counties through 230 AM MST... At 140 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cold front along a line extending from 38 miles northeast of Green River to 14 miles north of Castle Valley to 8 miles south of Spanish Valley. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 55 to 70 mph will be possible with this frontal passage. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Castle Valley, La Sal, Spanish Valley, Cisco and Gateway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 199 and 231. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 105 and 118. Utah 128 near mile marker 7, and between mile markers 12 and 44. Colorado 141 near mile marker 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Tavaputs Plateau
